code: import React from'react';import'bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.min.css';import{Button}from'react-bootstrap';import Avatar from'react-avatar';import avatar from'../image.png';import axios from'axios';function Buttons(_ref){var history=_ref.history;function handlechange1(){axios.post('http://localhost:5000/delete').then(function(resp){var valid=resp.data.valid;if(valid){alert("Account deleted Successfully");history.push('./');}});}function handlechange2(){history.push('./Change');}return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"contain",style:{paddingTop:'150px'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card",style:{width:'60%',height:'60%',marginLeft:'240px'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("h5",{className:"card-title",style:{paddingTop:'80px'}},"Click!!!"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"card-body",style:{bottom:'90px'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"avatar",style:{left:'390px',bottom:'90px'}},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Avatar,{src:avatar,round:true,size:"100"})),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{type:"submit",className:"btn-lg",style:{marginLeft:'100px'},onClick:handlechange1},"Delete Account!!"),/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Button,{type:"submit",className:"btn-lg",id:"button2",style:{marginLeft:'300px'},onClick:handlechange2},"Change Password"))));}export default Buttons;
